title: Looks like Georgia but isn't - Can you help?
content:
Looks like Georgia but isn't - Can you help?

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Screen Shot 2013-04-30 at 14.35.15.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020140139/http:/typophile.com/files/Screen%20Shot%202013-04-30%20at%2014.35.15.png) | 15 KB |
author: johnboymoulton

comments.content: For me it’s difficult to tell from such a small, blurry picture. It could be [Meta Serif](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020140139/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/fontfont/ff_meta_serif_pro_bold/?&fg=000000&bg=ffffff&sample_size=30&sample_text=Violence%20Should%20Be%20Expected.&ft=liga&acs_pt=32) or [Tisa](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020140139/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/fontfont/ff_tisa_pro_bold/?&fg=000000&bg=ffffff&sample_size=30&sample_text=Violence%20Should%20Be%20Expected.&ft=liga). Can you tell us where you found the sample?
